      • addOpenUpdateUser

        public boolean addOpenUpdateUser(java.lang.String operation,
                                 java.lang.String email,
                                 java.lang.String password,
                                 java.lang.String since)
        Add or update an user
        Parameters:
        operation - name of the operation - "Add", "Open" or "Update"
        email - new email of the user
        password - new password of the user
        since - Date of the account creation. Null if is to update or open
        Returns:
        Returns true if it was added/updated with success, and false if not

      • getUser

        public User getUser()
        Get instance of user
        Returns:
        Returns an instance of the user that is logged in

      • addGetType

        public long addGetType(java.lang.String operation,
                       java.lang.String title)
        Add a new type and returns the id of the type
        Parameters:
        operation - name of the operation - "Add" or "Update"
        title - Name of the new type/ name of the type to get ID
        Returns:
        Returns type ID

      • addUpdateCategory

        public boolean addUpdateCategory(java.lang.String operation,
                                 lpoo.pocketsave.Logic.Category newCategory)
        Add a new category or update one that already exists
        Parameters:
        operation - String to know which operation should be made - "Add" or "Update"
        newCategory - Category instance of the category to add
        Returns:
        Returns true if the category was added or updated and false if not

      • getCategory

        public java.util.ArrayList<lpoo.pocketsave.Logic.Category> getCategory(java.lang.String catTitle,
                                                                       java.lang.Boolean main,
                                                                       java.lang.String type)
        Get all or only one category. If is called without parameters (null) it will return all user categories
        Parameters:
        catTitle - Title of the category that should be returned. To get categories to be shown on the main menu, this variable should be "mainMenuCategories". If is null it will return all current user's categories
        main - If is a main category then this represents if is to get the 5 visible categories or the other ones. If null, it will return return the categories considering only catTitle value.
        type - Title of the type of the category to get
        Returns:
        Returns an array containing the categories

      • addUpdateTransaction

        public boolean addUpdateTransaction(java.lang.String operation,
                                    Transaction newTransaction)
        Add a new category or update one that already exists
        Parameters:
        operation - String to know which operation should be made - "Add" or "Update"
        newTransaction - Transaction instance to add or update
        Returns:
        Returns true if the transaction was added or updated and false if not

      • getTypeTransaction

        public java.util.HashMap<Transaction,java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>> getTypeTransaction(java.lang.String typeName,
                                                                                                boolean done)
        get an array with one or all transactions of the asked type
        Parameters:
        typeName - Name of the type to get transactions
        Returns:
        Returns an hashmap with key equals to the asked transactions and value as the months of that type transaction or null if there is any error

      • setMonths

        public void setMonths(java.util.HashMap<Transaction,java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>> transactions,
                      android.database.Cursor cursor)
        Set months in incomes and expenses
        Parameters:
        transactions - transactions hashmap
        cursor - Cursor of the transactions

      • getTransactionsBetweenDates

        public java.util.ArrayList<Transaction> getTransactionsBetweenDates(java.lang.String structure,
                                                                    java.lang.String catTitle_typeTitle,
                                                                    java.lang.String d1,
                                                                    java.lang.String d2,
                                                                    boolean done)
        Get transactions between dates of a specific category or a specific type
        Parameters:
        structure - Variable to identify if is to get transactions of a category ("Category") or of a type ("Type")
        catTitle_typeTitle - category title or type title to get transactions
        d1 - initial date
        d2 - final date
        done - variable to define if it is to get transactions that was already done or the ones that will happen in the future
        Returns:
        Returns an array containing the transactions

      • getTotalSpentValues

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> getTotalSpentValues(java.lang.String structure,
                                                                                java.lang.String catTitle_typeTitle,
                                                                                java.lang.String d1,
                                                                                java.lang.String d2,
                                                                                java.lang.Boolean done)
        Get total values spent of all categories or a specific category or a specific type
        Parameters:
        structure - Variable to identify if is to get transactions of a category ("Category") or of a type ("Type")
        catTitle_typeTitle - category title or type title to get spent values
        d1 - initial date
        d2 - final date
        done - variable to define if it is to get transactions that was already done or the ones that will happen in the future
        Returns:
        Returns an hashmap with the category/type name as key and the spent value as value

      • setTotalSpents

      • deleteElements

        public boolean deleteElements(java.lang.String element,
                              java.lang.String id)
        Delete and element from database
        Parameters:
        element - type of the element - "Transaction", "Category" or "User"
        id - ID of the element to delete. To delete user this should be null
        Returns:
        Returns true id the element that was deleted and false if not
